system.description: When you call on your allies for meetings, access, or information, roll +Reach.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: Your allies are unavailable, unwilling, or demand too high a price. You may strain relationships or reveal your needs to rivals.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: Your allies respond, but choose one: they want a significant favor in return, they can only provide limited assistance, or word of your request spreads to others.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: Your allies readily provide what you need. They may also offer additional assistance or useful information.
